title: I’Ll Rewrite The Husband I Regret
alternative_title: Reforming My Regretful Husband, 후회 남편을 고쳐 쓰겠습니다
status: Reforming My Regretful Husband, 후회 남편을 고쳐 쓰겠습니다
description:
Description :
        "Don't use the regretful male lead hashtag if the heroine doesn't end up with a regretful male lead!" After wailing over the ending of my favorite novel, I wake up as Cornia, the heroine who kicks her regretful hubby to the curb for a new flame. The catch? My heart's set on the regretful husband, Duke Ertein Belcita! But I'll have to overcome several obstacles to stay married to Ertein. First up, let's give those meddling villainous in-laws the boot. Watch out, world. Cornia's rewriting her love life!Reforming My Regretful Husband,    mangabuddy is a website dedicated to fans of anime, , , , video games, and cosplay.
